title: loaded greek chickpea pasta salad
directions: Prepare all vegetables and place them in a large bowl with the feta, chickpeas and parsley.
Cook chickapea pasta according to package directions. Drain and add to the bowl.
Add all dressing ingredients to a small bowl, or jar, and whisk until combined. Pour dressing over pasta salad and mix all ingredients together until itâ€™s combined.
Pasta salad can be served immediately or refrigerated up to 3 days.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) box Chickpea Pasta, whichever kind you like
1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 1/2 cups cherry tomatoes, cut in half
1 cup crumbled feta cheese, I use this homemade vegan tofu feta
